titleStmt.title: SII 8.38: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 38. (A.R. No. 452 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
śrīrājādhirājadevaṟku yāṇṭu 5vatu ceyyūrt tevarkaṇṭan tāṅkuvānāna Uttamacoḻa vaḷavataraiyanen Ittevaṟku Ikkoyilil śivabrāhmaṇar ciyāṟuteva nammaiyāḻvānum kaṭampan tāṅkuvānum kampan tevanum nitta tirumañcaṇak=kuṭam 2 Abhiṣekam paṇṇit tiruppa
ḷḷittāmañ cārttavum poliyūṭṭākak koṇṭa paḻaṅkā carai taippūcam cittiraic cataiyam vaikāci mulamum Āṭṭu munṟu nāḷ nakarapradakṣaṇa meḻun=taruḷak kāconṟuk=kut tiṅka ḷaraikkāṟ tiramam policaiyākak koṇṭa paḻaṅkā ciraṇṭarai Irumpupok=ki tūpamaṇiyat
tūpatippātranāṟpalam . ḷaddharmmaṅkaḷ candrādittavarai celuttakkaṭavomāno mimmuvom meṟpaṭiyen maturān=taka viṇṇakarāḻvāṟku Akkoyiliṟ kāṇiUṭaiya vaikāsaṉan Āḷi ĀrāAmutu Āḷitāmotaranāṉa veṅkaṭa
vanum nitta miraṇṭu tirumañcaṇakkuṭa mapiṣekam paṇṇit tirumālai cāttap paḻaṅkācu kāle Araikkāl viṣuvayanasaṁgramaṁgrahaṇaṁ Āṭṭāṟunāḷ pañcamaivyamāṭi Amutu ceyyap paḻaṅkā carai saddhiviḷak koṉṟuk kāṭu panniraṇṭu Ānica cataiya
meḻun=taruḷa Āṭṭic cataiyam tavintu Ūravar coṟpaṭi Ūṟku poruntum Āṭṭi Aniḻa meḻuntaruḷap paḻaṅkā conṟaṟaiye yaraikkāl kācoṉṟukkut tiṅka ḷaraikkāṟ tiramam policaikku nāṅkaḷ koṇṭa paḻaṅkā ciraṇṭarai . yi
tdharmmaṅkaḷ candrātitavarai celuttak kaṭavomāka yen kāṇiyāna viṣṇusthāṉattiluṅ kalveṭṭuvicco mimmuvom . tūppaṇi palmāheśvararum Ūravarum rakṣai . meṟpaṭi koyilkaḷiṟ ceyta dharmmam śivabrāhmaṇar rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 8.38 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
